name: AH CM + XJJ CM Training
description:
We will be tackling the first two EoD Strike Missions <:maitrin:954126378511527986>  **Atherblade Hideout** and <:ankka:954126378473762866> **Xunlai Jade Junkyard** in the challenge mode! **No experience with the NM of both encounters is required!**

Any type of DPS works for both encounters, but range DPS classes like power or condition Virtuoso <:virtuoso:948585484165210162>, power Mechanist <:mechanist:948585084842287184> , condition Specter <:specter:948585463415992335> or condition Scourge <:scourge:763701209122471958> help us to manage the reasonable DPS check.

For <:maitrin:954126378511527986>  **Atherblade Hideout CM** it is recommended to bring extra CC and projectile block/destruction.
For  <:ankka:954126378473762866> **Xunlai Jade Junkyard CM** bringing extra CC is also strongly recommended.

If you have any questions, send me a message!
